data.headline: Professional Shopware Development Services That Drive E-commerce Success
data.subcopy: Transform your online business with our expert Shopware 6 development services. From custom plugin development to complete enterprise migrations, we deliver scalable, high-performance e-commerce solutions that increase conversions and drive revenue growth for businesses worldwide.

data.heading: Comprehensive Shopware Development Services
data.subheading: End-to-end Shopware solutions tailored to your business needs and growth objectives

items.title: Custom Plugin Development
items.body: Develop powerful, scalable plugins that extend Shopware's core functionality. We create custom business logic, payment integrations, shipping solutions, and specialized features that give you competitive advantages in your market.

items.title: Professional Theme Development
items.body: Design and develop stunning, conversion-optimized themes that reflect your brand identity. Our responsive themes are built with modern web standards, accessibility compliance, and mobile-first approaches to maximize user experience.

items.title: Platform Migration & Upgrades
items.body: Seamlessly migrate from Magento, WooCommerce, PrestaShop, or legacy systems to Shopware 6. We ensure zero data loss, maintain SEO rankings, and minimize downtime during the transition process with comprehensive testing.

items.title: Shopware App Store Development
items.body: Create and publish applications on the official Shopware App Store to reach thousands of merchants globally. We handle the entire process from concept to publication, including app certification and ongoing maintenance.

items.title: Performance Optimization
items.body: Boost your store's speed and performance with advanced optimization techniques. We implement caching strategies, database optimization, CDN integration, and code improvements to achieve Core Web Vitals scores and faster loading times.

items.title: API Development & Integrations
items.body: Build robust REST APIs, GraphQL endpoints, and webhook integrations. Connect your Shopware store with ERP systems, CRM platforms, marketing tools, inventory management, and third-party services for streamlined operations.

items.title: Multi-store & B2B Solutions
items.body: Implement complex multi-store setups with centralized inventory management, B2B customer portals, custom pricing structures, quote systems, and approval workflows tailored for wholesale and enterprise businesses.

items.title: Headless Commerce Architecture
items.body: Leverage Shopware's API-first architecture to create headless commerce solutions. Build custom frontends with React, Vue.js, or Next.js while maintaining powerful backend functionality for maximum flexibility and performance.

items.title: 24/7 Maintenance & Support
items.body: Comprehensive ongoing support including security updates, bug fixes, performance monitoring, backup management, and feature enhancements. Our certified developers ensure your store runs smoothly with minimal downtime.

items.q: What Shopware versions do you support and what are the migration paths?
items.a: We specialize in Shopware 6 development (versions 6.4+) and provide migration services from Shopware 5 to Shopware 6. Our team is certified in the latest Shopware 6.5+ with expertise in Symfony 6.4, PHP 8.2+, and modern frontend technologies like Vue.js 3 and TypeScript. We also handle migrations from other platforms like Magento, WooCommerce, and PrestaShop to Shopware 6.

items.q: How do you handle complex B2B requirements and enterprise integrations?
items.a: We have extensive experience with B2B e-commerce, including customer-specific pricing tiers, quote management systems, approval workflows, bulk ordering capabilities, and custom catalog management. Our enterprise integrations include ERP systems (SAP, Microsoft Dynamics), CRM platforms (Salesforce, HubSpot), inventory management systems, and custom API development for seamless data flow between systems.

items.q: What is your approach to performance optimization and scalability?
items.a: We implement comprehensive performance optimization including Redis caching layers, Elasticsearch for advanced search functionality, CDN integration (Cloudflare, AWS CloudFront), database query optimization, lazy loading techniques, and Core Web Vitals optimization. Our solutions are built to handle high traffic volumes with horizontal scaling capabilities using cloud infrastructure like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.

items.q: Do you provide headless commerce and API-first solutions?
items.a: Yes, we develop headless Shopware solutions leveraging the Store API and Admin API. We create custom frontends using React, Next.js, Vue.js, or Nuxt.js while maintaining the powerful Shopware backend. This includes mobile app development, progressive web apps (PWA), and omnichannel experiences across multiple touchpoints including social commerce and IoT devices.

items.q: How do you ensure security, compliance, and data protection?
items.a: We implement comprehensive security measures including SSL/TLS encryption, PCI DSS compliance for payment processing, GDPR compliance with data protection features, regular security audits, penetration testing, and OWASP security guidelines. All our solutions include automated backup systems, disaster recovery plans, and 24/7 security monitoring with immediate threat response protocols.

items.q: What ongoing support and maintenance services do you provide?
items.a: Our support services include 24/7 monitoring and technical support, proactive security updates and patches, performance optimization, regular health checks, backup management, and feature development. We offer different support tiers from basic maintenance to comprehensive managed services with dedicated account managers, guaranteed response times, and custom SLA agreements based on your business needs.

items.q: How do you handle multi-store, multi-language, and international requirements?
items.a: We implement complex multi-store architectures with centralized inventory management, shared customer accounts, unified admin interfaces, and automated synchronization. Our international solutions include multi-currency support, localized payment methods, region-specific pricing, tax calculation for different jurisdictions, and compliance with local regulations. We also provide advanced translation management and content localization services.

items.q: What is your testing methodology and quality assurance process?
items.a: We follow comprehensive QA processes including automated testing with PHPUnit and Jest, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, cross-browser and device testing, performance testing with load simulation, security testing, and user acceptance testing (UAT). All code goes through peer review, static analysis, and we maintain test coverage above 80% for critical business logic.
